benchmark_details.name: PreprintToPaper dataset
benchmark_details.overview: The PreprintToPaper dataset connects bioRxiv preprints with their corresponding journal publications, enabling large-scale analysis of the preprint-to-publication process, with metadata for 145,517 preprints across two periods.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a comprehensive resource for studying how preprints evolve into published journal articles or remain unpublished.

data.annotation: Human-annotated subset for Gray Zone cases

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated based on title similarity using SequenceMatcher algorithm.
methodology.interpretation: Higher similarity scores indicate a stronger likelihood of a corresponding publication.
methodology.baseline_results: High inter-annotator agreement (Îº=0.86) for evaluation of Gray Zone matches.
methodology.validation: Validated using a human-annotated subset of 299 records.
